AddNotificationChannel.name: AddNotificationChannel
AddNotificationChannel.description: Grants permission to add a notification channel to DevOps Guru

DescribeAccountHealth.name: DescribeAccountHealth
DescribeAccountHealth.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations in your AWS account

DescribeAccountOverview.name: DescribeAccountOverview
DescribeAccountOverview.description:
Grants permission to view the health of operations within a time range in your AWS
                                                account

DescribeAnomaly.name: DescribeAnomaly
DescribeAnomaly.description: Grants permission to list the details of a specified anomaly

DescribeFeedback.name: DescribeFeedback
DescribeFeedback.description: Grants permission to view the feedback details of a specified insight

DescribeInsight.name: DescribeInsight
DescribeInsight.description: Grants permission to list the details of a specified insight

DescribeResourceCollectionHealth.name: DescribeResourceCollectionHealth
DescribeResourceCollectionHealth.description:
Grants permission to view the health of operations for each AWS CloudFormation stack
                                                specified in DevOps Guru

DescribeServiceIntegration.name: DescribeServiceIntegration
DescribeServiceIntegration.description:
Grants permission to view the integration status of services that can be integrated
                                                with DevOps Guru

GetCostEstimation.name: GetCostEstimation
GetCostEstimation.description: Grants permission to list service resource cost estimates

GetResourceCollection.name: GetResourceCollection
GetResourceCollection.description:
Grants permission to list AWS CloudFormation stacks that DevOps Guru is configured
                                                to use

ListAnomaliesForInsight.name: ListAnomaliesForInsight
ListAnomaliesForInsight.description: Grants permission to list anomalies of a given insight in your account

ListEvents.name: ListEvents
ListEvents.description: Grants permission to list resource events that are evaluated by DevOps Guru

ListInsights.name: ListInsights
ListInsights.description: Grants permission to list insights in your account

ListNotificationChannels.name: ListNotificationChannels
ListNotificationChannels.description:
Grants permission to list notification channels configured for DevOps Guru in your
                                                account

ListRecommendations.name: ListRecommendations
ListRecommendations.description: Grants permission to list a specified insight's recommendations

PutFeedback.name: PutFeedback
PutFeedback.description: Grants permission to submit a feedback to DevOps Guru

RemoveNotificationChannel.name: RemoveNotificationChannel
RemoveNotificationChannel.description: Grants permission to remove a notification channel from DevOps Guru

SearchInsights.name: SearchInsights
SearchInsights.description: Grants permission to search insights in your account

StartCostEstimation.name: StartCostEstimation
StartCostEstimation.description: Grants permission to start the creation of an estimate of the monthly cost

UpdateResourceCollection.name: UpdateResourceCollection
UpdateResourceCollection.description:
Grants permission to update the list of AWS CloudFormation stacks that are used to
                                                specify which AWS resources in your account are analyzed by DevOps Guru

UpdateServiceIntegration.name: UpdateServiceIntegration
UpdateServiceIntegration.description: Grants permissions to enable or disable a service that integrates with DevOps Guru
